spec_data.Name: perl-IO-HTML
spec_data.Description:
IO::HTML provides an easy way to open a file containing HTML while
automatically determining its encoding. It uses the HTML5 encoding sniffing
algorithm specified in section 8.2.2.1 of the draft standard.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:22:29 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Open an HTML file with automatic character set detection
